attributes.action: Openly and Publically Insist That The United States Government Conduct The First Ever Public Audit Of The Federal Reserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Federal Reserve is NOT a part of the US Federal Republic Government and is a private company.  All roads on the credit crunch lead back to Alan Greenspan and the Federal Reserve.  The Federal Reserve is above the laws and Government of the The United States and until the Federal Reserve is audited, the worlds finances, including the UK's and the EU's, can never truly recover or be independent and free until this action is taken and completed openly and publically.
